alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Bullock; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bullock, northeastern Barbour and southern Russell Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 226 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Union Springs to Hawkinsville to 11 miles south of Fort Benning/lawson Army Air Fld. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eufaula, Union Springs, Midway, Hawkinsville, Aberfoil, Spring Hill, Franklin Field, Comer, Barbour County Public Lake Dam, Lakepoint Resort State Park, Sedgefield, Batesville, Twin Springs, Rutherford, Lugo and Three Notch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Birmingham.
